column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We started with the baked goat cheese.  If you love cheese as much as I do
column2: it's a must.  I've had similar dishes elsewhere
column3: but I really enjoyed the bread that they served with it and the chunky tomatoes on top of the cheese.  The service is also wonderful at Bavette's - a waiter noticed we still had cheese
column5: so he brought us a basket of bread.
